pr_title: Enable setting additional recipients for errors in the test module

timeline.message: Enable setting additional recipients for errors in the test module

timeline.bodyText:
Ricardo,
You now determine if there are failed tests by parsing the test results.
I would prefer that you configure a forward named 'fail' on the LarvaPipe. That forward is used when there are failed tests.
timeline.author: gvanbrakel

timeline.bodyText:
I would like to suggest to name these mailaddresses:
errorreport.mailaddresses.pass
errorreport.mailaddresses.fail
timeline.author: gvanbrakel
